20101224234616.000|20101224234618.000|CC1|TEETH AND THEN BOUGHT HIM A

20101224234622.000|20101224234625.000|CC1|>> I FOUND HIM IN MY DUMPSTER.  
20101224234625.000|20101224234626.000|CC1|NOW HE'S MY ASSISTANT MANAGER.  
20101224234626.000|20101224234627.000|CC1|WHAT COULD BE BETTER THAN THAT? 
20101224234627.000|20101224234629.000|CC1|>> BUT RUFUS IS REMINDED EVERY  
20101224234629.000|20101224234631.000|CC1|BUM FIGHTS EVERY DAY BECAUSE    
20101224234631.000|20101224234634.000|CC1|THE TATTOOS ARE STILL ON HIS
